text: Humiliation is when someone is embarrassed by something, usually in public. It is usually when the person has no pride. It is an emotion felt by a person whose social status have lowered.Burton, Neel. "The Psychology of Humiliation." Psychology Today. 27 August 2014. 10 October 2016. Humiliation is currently an active research topic.Lindner, Evelin, Making Enemies: Humiliation and International Conflict. London, England: Praeger Security International, 2006. ==References== ==Related pages== *Masochism *Sadism Category:Emotions
title: Humiliation
